interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Too Faced Primed & Peachy Cooling Matte Perfecting Primer, 40 mL / 1.35 Fl.Oz.
Review Date: 2018/09/16
Store: Too Faced
Product Description: ["Cooling matte primer blurs and smooths your complexion with a brightening peach tint that works on any skin tone. Wear alone of under foundation for a mattifying soft-focus finish that's lightweight, comfortable, and long lasting."]
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Too Faced', 'Product Benefits': 'Brightening', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Item Volume': '40 Milliliters', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1 x 1 x 4 inches; 0.64 Ounces', 'UPC': '651986702275'}
Review Text: Tried this in the store and liked the smooth texture and peachy color but I use green products like Korres now
Review Title: no toxic smell
Rating: 4.0

I tried shampoo and conditioner sample and it lathered well despite packets being more than 3 yrs old. Would choose this over more toxic conventional brands such as VO5 or Pantene. FYI "Mill Creek" aloe vera shampoo is much cheaper and better quality
good lather and nice scent

Lovely fragrance and lasts long compared to other green brands
delicate scent
CAFE AU LAIT Vegetable Glycerin Bar Soap
Primal Elements
["Rich, creamy coffee aroma blended with real coffee grinds to remove cooking odors from busy chef's hands. HIGHLY MOISTURIZING - Glycerin is a humectant, attracting moisture and draws it deep into your skin to keep it hydrated. With over 25% glycerin in our soap, our soap moisturizes the skin with a rich lather that rinses cleanly away leaving the skin silky smooth. GREAT FOR FACE & BODY – When used as a face wash, glycerin soap will remove the excess oil from the skin to unclog pores. Unlike regular soaps, which dry out the skin and make it feel tight and flaky, our glycerin soaps keep the skin hydrated after use. HIGH QUALITY INGREDIENTS – Paraben Free, Cruelty Free and Vegan. Made in California, USA. GREAT FOR GIFTS - Each 5.8 oz. bar is shrink-wrapped and great for gift giving."]
{'Item Form': 'Bar', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Brand': 'Primal Elements', 'Scent': 'Coffee', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Package Dimensions': '5.59 x 2.99 x 0.51 inches; 3.53 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SWCAFE', 'UPC': '640986102925'}
Had bad experiences with glycerin soap in the past so was wary when trying this brand. However texture and fragrance exceeded expectations. Even though cupcake part falls out easily ... cant wait to try other "flavors"
delicious scent and gentle enough for face

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor health-conscious personal care products, valuing those enriched with natural ingredients that enhance their beauty routine. Their recent purchase demonstrates an interest in items with appealing textures and effective performance.

- **Quality Over Cost:** They persist in prioritizing quality over cost, gravitating towards superior, non-toxic, and eco-friendly options, further emphasizing their commitment to sustainability and wellness.

- **Scent and Performance:** The user maintains a strong inclination for products that deliver not only effective results but also an enjoyable sensory experience. They show particular preference for items that enhance relaxation and well-being.

- **Comparison Habits:** Their shopping behavior includes thorough comparisons to ensure an optimal balance between quality and price, showcasing their discerning nature in personal care choices.

- **Environmental/Health Consideration:** The user remains dedicated to avoiding synthetic and toxic ingredients, consistently reflecting their values towards health and environmental responsibility in their beauty selections.

- **Makeup Awareness:** Recent interactions highlight their ongoing diligence in selecting products that prioritize ingredient quality alongside aesthetic appeal, indicating a shift towards greener options while maintaining a discerning eye for performance.

Overall, the user embodies a commitment to natural, effective, and sensorially pleasing personal care products, demonstrating a consistent dedication to wellness, informed purchasing practices, and an evolving focus on greener formulations.
